Hi,

The VertextAction and the EdgeAction to not provide the graph they are called on. This annoys a little bit since the graphs they are called upon have to be global within the context.

Is it possible to pass on the reference to the current graph in accordance to the normal <...>Handler( object sender, EventArgs e)?

Thank you for this software ;)

Christoph

You can use closures to capture the graph.
